column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Stopped in last night around 10 PM and it was fairly busy. Tried to get a table but we were pretty tired from walking around all day so we got it to go. Ordered the Lou with half mushrooms half none
column2: brought it back to the hotel. Everything was piping hot and mouth watering. The cheese is always melty and amazing
column3: the best part is always the tomato slices on the top
column5: love them. Always tell my friends who are heading to Chicago to go here!
